short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play video links directly on XBMC. Support for Youtube, Vimeo and direct links

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple extension to allow playback of any video link through XBMC. It now supports youtube and vimeo through the standard plugins, other links are played directly. Use context menu of links to access functions
